title: BIM Pilot
description:
BIM Pilot is a web-based application designed for the interactive visualization of BIM models in IFC format.
It allows users to explore 3D models directly from the browser and access detailed information about every element within the model's structureâ€”no desktop software required.

Unlike traditional 3D viewers, BIM Pilot is not intended to replace existing desktop tools, but rather to serve as a more flexible and scalable technological foundation.
It acts as a starting point for the development of digital twins, enabling the integration of static data from IFC models with real-time information from external APIs or databases.

This project is built using That Open Company, a visualization library based on Three.js, which leverages WebIFC for reading and processing IFC model data directly in the browser.

With its web-first approach and open architecture, BIM Pilot offers an innovative solution for moving toward connected, intelligent, and easily accessible digital environments.
